title: Urf is coming!
body:
Hello phreak, 

So ive noticed that on pbe arurf is a minigame rn. Soooo.... Lets talk about making it normal urf and not ar urf and removing some of the buffs word.
so arurf not fun when u get bad champ tbh , remove. Lets about the crit chance buff, pls im guesing phreak made this(tbh) this is horrible anti fun idea fr fr.
So lets fix urf boys lets do it
